headline: Citizens Financial Group Announces Prime Rate Change
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., September 17, 2025--Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE: CFG) announced today that Citizens Bank, N.A. has decreased its prime lending rate to 7.25 percent from 7.50 percent, effective Thursday, September 18, 2025.
